intro: Use temperature sensor to read temperature

build.steps: Place the temperature sensor on the breadboard

steps: 1. Connect a jumper wire from A5 to the signal pin(the middle pin)
2. Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative of the sensor
3. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the positive rail of the breadboard
3. Connect a jumper wire from postive rail to the positive of the sensor
4. Go to the play section and check the temperature value
